channel.title: Help i've got an ERROR
channel.description:
Hmmm!!! Had this problem for 1 whole year. I ask it everytime and no one knows lol. I can't open clients. Everytime i Run it gives me ;
[code]'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
[/code]
Anyone knows why, Just post some idea's or so! It would really be helpful. Ill be here too therefor you will be posting for a reason.
